attributes.action: Void the result of the recent EU membership referendum.
attributes.additional_details:
Example: 'We stop sending £350 million every week to Brussel'
Example: 'We end the supremacy of EU law'
Example: 'We regain our seats on international institutions like the World Trade Organisation'
attributes.background: The result of the referendum was based on false information knowingly publicised by the Vote Leave campaign.
